[DESCRIPTION]
Prince of Persia : Trilogy is a special compilation , issued on the occasion of the third anniversary of the triumphant return to the world of electronic entertainment series Prince of Persia , whose roots date back to the late eighties of the twentieth century . This set was made available only to holders of fixed-line PlayStation 2 and includes games , issued in 2003-2005 by the corporation Ubisoft Entertainment .

Thus, thanks to the package discussed are experiencing the adventures of the title of Prince of Persia , associated with the legendary Sands of Time. In Prince of Persia : The Sands of Time so I know the main character , we learn to manipulate time , we explore the secrets of fighting etc . In turn, Prince of Persia : Warrior Within experiencing a much darker atmosphere than before, to finally to Prince of Persia : The Two Thrones interesting to see the split personality of the protagonist .

Each component Prince of Persia : Trilogy provides plenty of exciting in oriental shell . There is no shortage of running, jumping on platforms , butchering a lot of enemies , etc. Everything in detail fledged visual setting , rendered in real time by efficient engine called JADE .
